docs.snippet: LEAD: From Mexico to Argentina, Latin American governments today roundly condemned the use of force by the United States against Gen. Manuel Antonio Noriega of Panama.
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: From Mexico to Argentina, Latin American governments today roundly condemned the use of force by the United States against Gen. Manuel Antonio Noriega of Panama.

headline.main: Fighting in Panama: Latin America; U.S. Denounced by Nations Touchy About Intervention

byline.original: By JAMES BROOKE, Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD: TEN correspondents of The New York Times, from countries as near as Mexico and as far away as Malaysia, were asked to select their favorite spots for a quick getaway on a winter weekend. Their choices include a beach where you can get some sun...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: TEN correspondents of The New York Times, from countries as near as Mexico and as far away as Malaysia, were asked to select their favorite spots for a quick getaway on a winter weekend. Their choices include a beach where you can get some sun and a desert where it's best avoided, cozy inns and more rugged retreats, places to watch the water, watchthe people, or be watched by tigers.

headline.main: Ten Escapes to the Exotic: Uruguay
